# GKPlayer.PhotoSize

**Enumeration**

The size of a photo that Game Center loads.

## Declaration

```swift
enum PhotoSize
```

## Constants

- **GKPlayer.PhotoSize.small**: Loads a small photo.
- **GKPlayer.PhotoSize.normal**: Loads a normal-sized photo.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Loading player photos

- **loadPhoto(for:withCompletionHandler:)**: Loads a photo of the player from Game Center.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: Loads a photo of the player from Game Center.
items.name: loadPhoto(for:withCompletionHandler:)

title: GKPlayer.PhotoSize
